title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When clicking on other buttons, the system produces a bell sound.
EB: I expect to hear a Windows 'ding' when doing this, indicating that something went wrong.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Choose the SWT.MULTI option.
3. Observe the bell sound.
4. Click on other buttons and notice the continued bell sound.
